analysis: The project is a static website about black holes with a basic structure in place. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The theme needs to be enhanced with a cosmic black hole theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML structure needs to be completed to include sections related to black holes, and the CSS needs to be updated to reflect the cosmic theme with appropriate animations and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the HTML content to include sections about black holes, such as an introduction, formation, types, and effects on space-time. Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and styling.
Update the CSS file to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements.
Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions for the mobile menu toggle.
